alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 8:39AM CST until February 08 at 9:51AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Some residences along Lower Wetumpka Road...Brooks Road and Anderson Road beome threatened. At higher stages evacuations may become necessary at Red Eagle Honor Farm. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 31.5 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
